FuncDef: This command configures the syslog log prefix. For more information, refer to the7450 ESS, 7750 SR, 7950 XRS, and VSR System Management Guide. Theconfig>log>syslog>levelhierarchy also applies to this context.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an alphanumeric string, up to 32 characters. Spaces and colons ( : ) cannot be used in the string.
